title: Implement DE in pytorch.optim
body_html:
Hi,

I’d like to use PyTorch to run Evolutionary algorithms on GPU. I noticed that DE (differential evolution) is implemented in Torch (https://github.com/torch/optim/blob/master/de.lua), so I was thinking to implement DE in PyTorch.

As DE is not (widely) used in Deep Learning I wanted to check with you if it is in your interest to have DE implemented in PyTorch? I’m happy to discuss the implementation and create PR when ready.

Once I learn more about PyTorch (by implementing DE) I’d also like to implement Genetic algorithm (GA) in the near future.

Best,
Dejan
